title:
Embedding-Projection Correspondences for the estimation of the
  Gromov-Hausdorff distance
authors: Facundo M\'emoli and Zane T. Smith
abstract:
This writeup describes ongoing work on designing and testing a certain family
of correspondences between compact metric spaces that we call
\emph{embedding-projection correspondences} (EPCs). Of particular interest are
EPCs between spheres of different dimension.
